Turlock.KBDG: KBDG (90.9 FM) is a radio station broadcasting a variety of different Middle Eastern music, concentrating on Assyrian music. Daily news announcements and weekly interviews also are conducted live through 90.9 by the primary anchorwoman, Sweeny Lelham. Licensed to Turlock, California, USA. The station is currently owned by Assyrian American Civic Club of Turlock, Inc.
